description: In Azure environments, consider setting a policy to block subscription transfers.(Citation: Azure Subscription Policies) In AWS environments, consider using Service Control Policies to prevent the use of the `LeaveOrganization` API call.(Citation: AWS RE:Inforce Threat Detection 2024)

external_references.description: Ben Fletcher and Steve de Vera. (2024, June). New tactics and techniques for proactive threat detection. Retrieved September 25, 2024.
Microsoft Azure. (2024, March 21). Manage Azure subscription policies. Retrieved September 25, 2024.
